title: Alain Préfaci
text:
Alain Préfaci (born 1 March 1957) is a French <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager and former player. As of 2020, he is the head coach of <a href="R%C3%A9gional%203">Régional 3</a> club US Castelginest.
Playing career.
Préfaci was a product of the <a href="Paris%20Saint-Germain%20Youth%20Academy">Paris Saint-Germain Youth Academy</a>. He made his debut for <a href="Paris%20Saint-Germain%20F.C.">Paris Saint-Germain</a>'s first team in a 1–0 <a href="Coupe%20de%20France">Coupe de France</a> win against <a href="Olympique%20de%20Marseille">Marseille</a> on 30 March 1982. His final match for the club was a 1–0 Coupe de France defeat against <a href="FC%20Mulhouse">Mulhouse</a> on 28 January 1984.
Managerial career.
Préfaci's first managerial role was as <a href="Player-coach">player-manager</a> of ASPTT Toulouse. He would go on to coach US Plaisance du Touch and AS Toulouse Mirail before joining US Castelginest.
Honours.
Paris Saint-Germain
